recipes.title: Vegan Mac and Cheese
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta and and make creamy cashews sauce , add sweet potato and yellow potato to good texture, Vegan Mac and Cheese is ready!

recipes.title: Vegan Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry tofu and vegetables, add soy sauce. Delicious vegan stir-fry ready!

recipes.title: Vegan Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix wheat flour, Almond milk and avocado oil together , along with little baking powder,let batter rest for sometime and then slowly cook them, add Maple syrup and choice of your fruit aand enjoy

recipes.title: Vegan Burrito
recipes.instructions: Place the tortillas on a flat, clean work surface. Add a layer of spinach followed by the rice, beans, peppers, guacamole,bell peppers and onions, fold the toritlla and enjoy it with salsa dip!

recipes.title: Veggie Fajitas
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry mushrooms, onions,bell peppers in a pan, add boiled black beans to it, add this mixture to tortilla and top it with chopped onions tomatoes and clintro!

recipes.title: Eggplant Lasagna
recipes.instructions: Add tomato sauce in a baking pan, top it with roasted eggplant , top it with cheese fillings , repeat these layers and baki it , final Garnish it with basil leaves!

recipes.title: Stuffed Peppers
recipes.instructions: Roast bell peppers, add rice or potato filling as per your choice and top it with cheese, broil untill chesse melts and stuffed peppers are ready!

recipes.title: Baked Potato
recipes.instructions: Poke potatoes with fork so as to have holes in them , heat them in the oven with some salt ,once cooled off, add sour cream and butter, enjoy!

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad
recipes.instructions: Mix veggies with boiled quinoa, add cheese and garnish it with olive oil dressing and mix herbs!

recipes.title: Vegetarian Chili
recipes.instructions: Add boiled kidney beans, to roasted onions and bell peppers, garlic and boiled corn kernels,garnish it with lime and olive oil dressing, serve it Hot!
